items.simpleContent: {"images":[{"width":1280,"height":959,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231230/2023123012072085178404.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":959,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231230/2023123012071352567692.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1280,"height":959,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231230/2023123012072354890356.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":8,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"26天了，不知道说什么，努力吧","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231229/2023122912263794578398.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":804,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231229/2023122912263868943323.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1280,"height":959,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231229/2023122912263906487582.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线25天，状态总体是好的，在写的过程中，有一会是那么整个人空空的，只剩下手里的笔在动，速度也不用去控制，很空很慢，但是一会就有又杂念，就有不怎么样，emmm很舒服的感觉吧，没有时间概念，什么念头都没有，有点从里到外都空空的感觉的意思","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230915/2023091506165831359228.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1920,"height":1080,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230915/2023091506181261225847.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230915/2023091506171063753373.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖4天，今天特别有感觉，提前复习了老师的视频，看不到起笔就换一种方法去感受它，今天在练竖的时候才第一次切切实实感受到拉皮筋的感觉，刚刚开始是那种还轻松的就可以拉动，到后面“拉”这个“皮筋”好像“寸步难行”一样，会不自觉想屏住呼吸，发现后缓了一下放松自己，突然感觉很简单了一样，就是不好看哈哈哈，然后会腰酸背痛，看老师说是身体在适应发力和调整，慢慢的就好了，然后竖之后又是94天横，应该是受竖的影响，速","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230723/2023072302515833881056.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230723/2023072302515833871301.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230723/2023072302515836888744.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"40天～，今天感觉状态还不错～✌️继续加油坚持✊","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230722/2023072204231804499835.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230722/2023072204231805719172.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"39天了，今天状态非常好，能感觉到比昨天有进步💪坚持✊","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230721/2023072102482936445551.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天状态感觉特别好，画的线感觉也是比较到位，加油✊争取，尽力做到心无旁骛，慢下来去感受","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230720/2023072004151940782264.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"37天，一个月又一个星期了，坚持下来蛮不可置信的，这两天总是很浮躁，把兴趣爱好当成任务了就不想去完成，被自己画的圈困住了，努力调整调整状态","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230719/2023071903061410837722.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230719/2023071903063941893878.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230719/2023071903061414031281.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"36天，写了半张打算停笔了的，然后越看越不满意，又重新认认真真慢慢的写\n顺其自然了，每天认真做好每天的任务就好了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230718/2023071802153652845388.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230718/2023071802153637796236.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"35天，画线画出迷茫来了，整个人特别混乱，好在感觉到了一点🤏，应该还是在控笔的问题上，坚持✊","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230717/2023071702295726320160.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"34天，感觉更多的问题还是在控笔上，每天进步一点点就好了，急不来～，认真做好每天的作业就好了💪","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1706,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230716/2023071601480316029575.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230716/2023071601480314474682.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"33天，今天感觉是在磨合期，从意识到问题到解决问题的磨合过程，还是用开车打比喻，前32天总喜欢一边开车一边左顾右盼，今天就是下意识的纠正，不然就会出现手在前面走，眼睛在看别的地方，然后意识就会是在想这个直不直这样子，把眼睛叫回来后注意了就在让眼睛不要乱看，从而忽略了手上功夫也就是速度的问题\n加油✊","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230715/2023071506152487888937.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230715/2023071506152486643231.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"32天，一日之计在于晨，昨天还寻思着差了点什么，哪里不对劲这样子，看了一个同学的打卡深受启发，就是关于意在笔先这一点，没有落实到行动上，没有做到知行合一，就好比在开车，状态都有了，都是没有方向，早知道向前，就导致容易向上或者向下，偏了一点这个样子，还瞻前顾后，今天就是特别注意了这点，也不知道形容的准不准确，但是整体下来我是感觉有进步的～今天就是还有一点注意力不集中，但是好在知道问题在哪里了，加油✊","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230714/202307140533105108846.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1699,"height":1274,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230714/202307140533203554706.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"31天，明明前天还在认为慢下来是非常难的事情，现在就比之前慢了好多好多，认认真真的完成作业，头和尾都比之前好很多，总感觉有哪个地方不对劲，或许是速度上，又或者是控笔上，相信时间会解决一切～哈哈。\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230713/2023071305043608552449.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230713/202307130504362074986.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230713/2023071305043621019429.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"30天打卡，今天感觉就是彻底的慢了下来，像蜗牛一样龟速前进，什么的感觉不到，只有眼前缓慢行驶的笔，什么都不用想，沉淀下来了一样，这一个月下来像个分水岭，\n第一张刚刚开始还会急躁，不耐心，写着写着就静了下来，也不用特意去控制，很自然而然的认认真真去做一件事，就只有眼前的事，坚持✊","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2016,"height":1380,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230712/2023071203291332462922.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230712/2023071203291333872366.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230712/2023071203291331931616.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第29天，在练的过程中不知不觉就静下心来，慢慢的画线更能去调整和发现不对的地方，坚持✊每天进步一点点","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230711/2023071106260064841344.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230711/2023071106260061670765.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230711/2023071106260067410966.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第28天，今天整体速度都慢下来，但是更慢一点还需要控制，差不多两个小时断断续续写了三张，状态感觉还好，坚持✊","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230710/2023071003330720220811.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1470,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230710/2023071003330719890428.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"27天，状态不太对，心里焦着，质下降了一些，写了两张，反反复复调整，有一段用手婉发力，及时发现调整，坚持✊","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230709/202307090824520706989.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230709/2023070908245292561396.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230709/2023070908245206010731.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"26天，第一张是中午写的，受气味影响状态，感觉不太好，没有质量，晚上重新打卡写作业","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230708/2023070803213461575786.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230708/2023070803213461294325.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230708/2023070803213461446604.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第25天啦，每天再慢一点点，线就直一点点🤏，今天感觉比昨天好很多，昨天慢了会歪，今天还是有一点点🤏，每天都在进步💪","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230707/2023070702363961478570.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第24天，今天速度再慢了一点写🙈大家都花多久时间写啊✍️","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1725,"height":1294,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230706/2023070603133959268524.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第23天，速度问题，今天在写的时候特别注意放慢速度，调整状态，进步可观，应该还是不够慢，坚持✊","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1039,"height":1137,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230705/2023070503093521064849.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230705/2023070503093533155091.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230705/2023070503093527627814.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第22天，托阿基的福，有那么点意思了，偶尔一两根好看的线，述古感觉也可以控制差不多了，感谢阿基同学的激励，哈哈哈一口气写了四张，写一会就告诉自己慢一点，求质不求量","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230704/2023070408371384211566.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"打卡打卡21天，哈哈哈，今天感觉不错，努力克服出现的问题，总结：还是不够慢","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230703/2023070301332617464938.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230703/2023070301331798529374.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"20天啦，贵在坚持✊，感觉毛笔有点问题，毛头部分明明类似是圆的，写起来分两边，一边家可以成功写出中锋，另一边完全铺不开，就扁了似的，买了古述、还在路上，之前听说难用，第一个想法就是逃避，就没有买，哈哈哈哈但是牛老师有一句话说的特别对，点醒了我，然后我觉得这句话渗透生活的方方面面，以小见大属于了。\n就是牛老师说（大概意思），觉得它难用，去逃避它，可能就会错过一些别的东西，记不清了，但是大概意思是这样","hasMore":true}
